channel.description: Recent content in filesystem on Delven Documentation

item.title: File System
item.description: The fs module provides an API for interacting with the file system in a manner closely modeled around standard POSIX functions. Goal of this inerface is to be compatible with Node.js File System API Compatibility objective : 80% To use this module: const fs = require('fs'); All file system operations have synchronous and asynchronous forms. fs.readFile(path) Compatibility : broken Open, read and return text content of a file. It will throw an exception if it fails.
